subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Nerud saddled more than 1,000 winners, including 27 in stakes races, and named his greatest horse, Dr. Fager, after the neurosurgeon who saved his life.
snippet: Nerud saddled more than 1,000 winners, including 27 in stakes races, and named his greatest horse, Dr. Fager, after the neurosurgeon who saved his life.
